topic.title: 이웃에게 화분 물주기 부탁하기
topic.description: 휴가 기간 동안 집을 비우게 되어 이웃에게 화분에 물을 줘달라고 정중하게 부탁하는 상황의 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 제가 다음 주에 잠시 집을 비우게 되었는데, 부탁 하나만 드려도 될까요?
혹시 제가 없는 동안 저희 집 화분에 물 좀 주실 수 있을까요?
물론이죠! 걱정 말고 휴가 잘 다녀오세요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hi, neighbor. Do you have a moment?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hi, neighbor. | Do you have a moment?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I'll be out of town next week, and I was wondering if I could ask you a favor?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I'll be out of town next week, || and I was wondering if I could ask you a favor?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Of course, what can I help you with?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Of course, | what can I help you with?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Could you possibly water my plants while I'm away?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Could you possibly | water my plants | while I'm away?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Absolutely! Don't worry and have a great vacation.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Absolutely! || Don't worry and have a great vacation.
